course_title: Introduction to Quantitative and Qualitative Research Methods in Indigenous Health Research

002.comments: Please contact the Centre for Excellence in Indigenous Health for registrationMeeting Dates and Times:Monday February 17 to Friday February 21, 20201:30 pm to 5:00 pmClassroom SPPH B104Faculty: Dr. Nadine Caron  and  Dr. Patricia Spittal

description: Qualitative, quantitative and mixed methods research as applied to Indigenous public health priorities.
